properties.title: YAML 1.2 parser and emitter for Java 8

release.description: Add support for the Beans project
release.action: Refactor BaseRepresenter to introduce protected method getRepresenter() (2019-07-21)
Simplify parsing integers and floats removing YAML 1.1 types (2019-07-21)
Refactor the way the getDefaultConstruct() is used (2019-06-23)
Remove optional ConstructNode as the root factory method (2019-06-23)
Add custom runtime properties to Node to support Engine (2019-06-20)
Add protected methods to create Composer to support Engine (2019-06-16)
Remove redundant LoadSettings from Load.createComposer() method (2019-06-16)
Introduce static methods to create builders for settings (2019-06-16)
Improve Javadoc and add examples for identation in block flow (2019-06-15)
Add examples for custom default collections (2019-06-14)
Use Base64 encoding provided by the JDK 8 (2019-05-05)
Add the way to get anchor for a Node. It is a consequence of issue 441 in SnakeYAML (2019-04-13)
Introduce NonPrintableStyle setting. This is deviation from SnakeYAML where the default is the opposite (2019-03-23)
Allow TAB to precede a token (2019-02-10)
Do not allow recursive keys by default (2019-01-28)
Refactor BaseConstructor: Factored out postponed mapping logic so subclasses can effectively override constructMapping2ndStep() and delegate to the postponed mapping logic. (2019-01-22)
Customize simple key length when dumping. Import from SnakeYAML, issue 431 (2019-01-17)
Wrap runtime exceptions into YamlEngineException (2019-01-14)
Null tag constructor not called when parsing top-level null value (2019-01-13)
Promote project to Sonatype https://issues.sonatype.org/browse/OSSRH-39762 (2018-09-03) See https://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html
Create project (2018-04-22)
